data.comment: The match is underway at Stade de la Meinau.
Throw-in Strasbourg.
In the minute 2, Ball safe as Nice is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nice awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Stade de la Meinau, Nice are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Strasbourg at Stade de la Meinau.
Corner awarded to Strasbourg.
Jerome Brisard signals a Strasbourg throw-in in Nice's half.
In the minute 6, Mehdi Chahiri for Strasbourg gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Nice have a goal kick.
Free kick Nice.
In the minute 8, Strasbourg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Strasbourg.
Hassane Kamara of Nice gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 10, Goal kick for Strasbourg at Stade de la Meinau.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Strasbourg.
Free kick for Nice in their own half.
In the minute 13, In Strasbourg Nice attack through Amine Gouiri. The finish is off target, however.
Jerome Brisard awards Strasbourg a goal kick.
In the minute 13, In Strasbourg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Jordan Lotomba (Nice) has received a yellow card from Jerome Brisard.
Strasbourg have been awarded a corner by Jerome Brisard.
Ball goes out of play for a Nice goal kick.
In the minute 15, Free kick for Nice in the half of Strasbourg.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Strasbourg.
Throw-in for Strasbourg in their own half.
In the minute 17, In Strasbourg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Morgan Schneiderlin (Nice) gets a yellow card.
Jerome Brisard awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 21, Goal kick for Strasbourg at Stade de la Meinau.
Jerome Brisard blows against Strasbourg's Ludovic Ajorque for offside.
Nice have a goal kick.
In the minute 24, Free kick for Strasbourg in the half of Nice.
At Stade de la Meinau, Dante has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Strasbourg's Kenny Lala misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 25, Ball goes out of play for a Nice goal kick.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Strasbourg in their own half.
Eddy Sylvestre (Nice) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 31, Strasbourg's Mehdi Chahiri breaks free at Stade de la Meinau. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Jerome Brisard awards Nice a goal kick.
Jerome Brisard awards Strasbourg a goal kick.
In the minute 33, It's a goal kick for the home team in Strasbourg.
Nice have a goal kick.
Nice have been given a penalty...
In the minute 36, Lamine Kone for Strasbourg has been booked by Jerome Brisard and receives a first yellow card.
Kasper Dolberg converts the penalty to give Nice a 0-1 lead.
Free kick for Nice in their own half.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Strasbourg in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Nice!
Strasbourg needs to be cautious. Nice have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 42, Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Strasbourg in their own half.
Free kick Strasbourg.
Nice's Pierre Lees-Melou has been booked in Strasbourg.
In the minute 43, Jerome Brisard awards the away team a throw-in.
Nice awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Strasbourg to take a throw-in in Nice territory.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Strasbourg in their own half.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 45, Nice's Kasper Dolberg has been booked in Strasbourg.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Can Strasbourg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nice's half?
In the minute 46, Majeed Waris is replacing Lamine Kone for Strasbourg at Stade de la Meinau.
Throw-in for Strasbourg in the half of Nice.
In the minute 47, Can Strasbourg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nice's half?
Strasbourg have a dangerous throw-in.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Strasbourg.
In the minute 49, Goal kick for Nice at Stade de la Meinau.
Throw-in for Strasbourg in the half of Nice.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Nice.
In the minute 53, Ball goes out of play for a Strasbourg goal kick.
Corner awarded to Strasbourg.
Strasbourg's Majeed Waris gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 54, Goal kick for Nice at Stade de la Meinau.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ludovic Ajorque (Strasbourg) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 57, Ball goes out of play for a Nice goal kick.
Free kick for Strasbourg in their own half.
Strasbourg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 59, Goal! Kasper Dolberg extends Nice's lead to 0-2.
Can Strasbourg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nice's half?
In the minute 62, Nice awarded a free kick in their own half.
Patrick Vieira (Nice) is making a first substitution, with Rony Lopes replacing Eddy Sylvestre.
Strasbourg to take a throw-in in Nice territory.
Idriss Saadi is on a sub for Adrien Thomasson for Strasbourg.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Strasbourg.
In the minute 64, Jerome Brisard signals a Strasbourg throw-in in Nice's half.
In the minute 64, Lucien Kevin Zohi is replacing Mehdi Chahiri for the home team.
Strasbourg make their fourth substitution with Anthony Caci replacing Lionel Carole.
Throw-in for Strasbourg in the half of Nice.
Throw-in for Strasbourg close to the penalty box.
In the minute 66, Jerome Brisard awards Nice a goal kick.
Can Strasbourg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nice's half?
Throw-in Nice.
In the minute 70, Throw-in for Nice at Stade de la Meinau.
Nice will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Strasbourg.
Jerome Brisard signals a Strasbourg throw-in in Nice's half.
In the minute 73, At Stade de la Meinau, Alexander Djiku has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Free kick Nice.
Strasbourg have a goal kick.
In the minute 78, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The away team replace Kephren Thuram Ulien with Alexis Trouillet.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
Nice have been awarded a corner by Jerome Brisard.
In the minute 83, Dimitri Lienard is on a sub for Jeanricner Bellegarde for Strasbourg.
Kasper Dolberg is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 85, Nice to take a throw-in in Strasbourg territory.
Free kick for Nice in their own half.
Kasper Dolberg is back on his feet again.
In the minute 87, Strasbourg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Jerome Brisard signals a Strasbourg throw-in in Nice's half.
Ball safe as Nice is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Nice at Stade de la Meinau.
It's 0-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
Patrick Vieira (Nice) has taken off Kasper Dolberg who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Dan Ndoye is the replacement.
